title: Katie Hill resigns from Congress and vows to end scourge of 'revenge porn'
text:
One of America’s first openly bisexual members of Congress has resigned amid allegations of an affair with an aide. Katie Hill, a 32-year-old Democrat representing California, announced her resignation on Sunday.

On Thursday the website DailyMail.com had published naked images of her with her aide Morgan Desjardins. Miss Desjardins began a relationship with Ms Hill and her husband in 2017, shortly after she began working for the congresswoman. Ms Hill has admitted the relationship was “improper”.

The website also published images of Ms Hill with her campaign finance director, Graham Kelly, and claims by Ms Hill’s now-estranged husband that the pair were having an affair. Ms Hill has denied having a relationship with Mr Kelly. He has not commented.

The publication of the images sparked an investigation announced on Wednesday by the House Ethics Committee.

Both her relationship with Miss Desjardins and Mr Kelly – if proven - would violate House ethics rules against relationships with junior employees, brought in in light of the #MeToo scandal.
description: One of America’s first openly bisexual members of Congress has resigned amid allegations of an affair with an aide.
